== Contributing ==
If you have an idea for quote template, or having some images that useful for this repo assets, you can contribute freely under [[LICENSE|CC0-1.0]] License. Any forms of contributing is hugely welcome.

If you didn't have any experiences on BBCode-ing but you have an idea, issuing is also allowed.
